description: A woman in her 30s–40s. Heavy makeup, a wide unsettling smile.

npcTexts: Oh! You're the new night guard?
Keep your eyes open tonight… at my circus, someone once lost an entire… head!
Hahaha, just kidding, don’t look at me like that!
Just moved in last week, but I already know all the creaks in this hallway.
Each night it feels like it’s breathing… like a giant beast, you know?
Oops, I’m rambling again, not real of course!
I’m a comedian… no, a circus act!
Sometimes I even play a cannibal impersonator.
Don’t worry, I’ve never eaten anyone… yet.
Hmm… last night I saw someone standing outside my door for an hour.
But when I opened it… no one was there.
If you hear laughter in the hall tonight… it’s probably me.
Or… maybe someone else. Hehe, sleep well!
Oh, hello night guard!
Guess what I dreamed last night?
I dreamed everyone here looked exactly the same hahaha!
Told you already, just over a week. Or… two?
Oh, my memory is such a mess.
At the circus I even forgot my own birthday once!

options.playerText: Do you go out at night?
npcTexts: Of course! Night is when the stage lights shine best.
I work in a circus, after all.
Nope, no strangers. Everyone looks familiar.
But if there were, maybe they just wanted to see a show hahaha!
If you hear applause tonight, clap along.
In the circus, that’s good manners.
Oh, still doing well today?
I had that same dream again last night.
Everyone looked the same, so I had to tell them apart by their voices.
Like it?
Well, I’ve only been here less than two weeks.
But honestly, I feel fine anywhere.
Sure! Everyone smiles at me.
Though their smiles are stiff… like statues.
Everyone seems suspicious if you stare long enough.
And if you stare at me too long… I might look suspicious too.
Haha, try it!
Enjoy your shift.
And remember… if someone knocks three times, don’t open. Unless it’s me, of course!
Hi there! Don’t be alarmed, I just… look a little different.
At the circus, we change appearances all the time.
But I swear, this isn’t makeup… at least not today.
Okay! Just… sleeping less lately.
Sometimes I crave a bit of raw meat.
And you’re looking quite tasty right now…

options.playerText: Do you remember what you told me?
npcTexts: Hmm… what did I say again? Oh right, about the knocking and the dreams.
Those were just stories I made up to tease you.
Always smile, okay?
Like me, I can’t stop smiling at all now.
Haha, give it a try!
If you see me at the end of the hall tonight… don’t come closer.
It’ll make quite a circus act.
